name: mikroe.click.boost11
short_description: Boost 11 Click is a compact add-on board that boosts low input voltages to a stable output. This board features the XCL105B331H2-G, a synchronous step-up DC/DC converter from TOREX Semi. It operates from an input voltage as low as 0.9V, ideal for devices using single Alkaline or Nickel-metal hydride batteries, with an output fixed at 3.3V. It features an EN pin for easy start-up and standby mode and supports both 3.3V and 5V logic levels. This versatility makes Boost 11 Click suitable for industrial equipment, IoT devices, wearables, and applications prioritizing battery life.
